actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of day-use public recreation facilities at Lake Berryessa on the Solano reclamation project in the State of California.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to develop, operate and maintain such day-use recreation facilities as he deems necessary for the use of visitors to, and the administration of, the Federal lands and water at lake Berryessa, Solano project, California. Authorizes the appropriation to the Bureau of Reclamation such amounts as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of day-use public recreation facilities at Lake Berryessa on the Solano reclamation project in the State of California.
